page.title: 09ASHFIELDS HERB NURSERY
page.content: The Nursery has been there for twenty five years. The owners before were Mr Evett and Mr Hugo. Mrs Beard and Mr Beard have been there for four years Mr and Mrs Beard bought it as a home.People came to her and said to her will you carry on doing this. Mr and Mrs Beard had to learn about the herbs very quickly. Some of the herbs go to London and Porstmouth and all over the country.Chemists have the herbs for making medicines and creams. Universities have them for studying many problems.One plant, the feverfew is said to help people with bad headaches. Botanists make special journeys to see the many different kinds of herbs
